sn1.3:4.2: Standing to one side, that deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.3:5.1: “This life, so very short, is led onward.
sn1.3:5.2: There’s no shelter for someone who’s been led on by old age.
sn1.3:5.4: you should do good deeds that bring happiness.”
sn1.3:6.1: “This life, so very short, is led onward.
sn1.3:6.2: There’s no shelter for someone who’s been led on by old age.
sn1.3:6.4: one looking for peace would drop the world’s bait.”
